meanings.sent1: The dark clouds signaled the impendent storm.
meanings.sent2: The impendent arrival of the train made the passengers excited.
meanings.sent3: The impendent surprise party was almost ruined by the early arrival of the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The impendent deadline loomed over the students like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The impendent danger of the approaching tornado forced everyone to seek shelter immediately.

meanings.sent1: The impendent branches swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The impendent chandelier added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The impendent curtain brushed against the window with each gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: The impendent threat of the sword hanging over his head kept him on edge.
meanings.sent5: The impendent cliff edge made her heart race as she looked down.
